title: Every Night
lyrics:
Call me a fool
Send me away
I've got to say
It's you I adore
Alone and in love
Falling apart
I followed my heart
Straight to your door
Face to face
With all honesty
I would be grateful
If you'd give to me
One night to lay in your arms
One night could it be that I was born
To make every dream
You ever had come true
Oh in one night
Oh just one night, with you
Oh baby
Standing this close
The sound of your voice
It leaves me no choice
I offer my love
Am I so wrong to think you
Think you might fall?
Cause baby you're all
You're all that I'm thinking of
Face to face
With all honesty
I would be grateful
If you'd give to me
One night to lay in your arms
One night could it be that I was born
To make every dream
You ever had come true
Oh in one night
Oh, one night with you
One night to lay in your arms
One night
One, one night
Face to face
With all honesty
Call me a fool
It's you I adore
